Title: Raona  - Silverlight 3D Cloth
HomeWiki:
Raona Silverlight 3D Cloth

3D Cloth set, and displayed in a virtual 3D environment by using Microsoft Silverlight and Kit3D.
Physics (gravity, springness, dumping, and so on) developed on this same project.

Main parameters to be set:
  • Physics parameters (springness, forces - wind, gravity, ... - , node weight)
  • Number of nodes (cloth is set, by default, as a 10x10 nodes grid) - 100 nodes - ).
  • Fixed nodes (by default, nodes on vertices are fixed)


Developed by:
Òscar Oto
